comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This was in the days of March Inaugurals. Woodrow Wilson was inaugurated as President on March 4, 1913 in Washington, and Williams Jennings Bryan en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Jennings_Bryan served as his Secretary of State from 1913-1915.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Another Bain photo was taken at about the same time: Bryan resigned as Secretary of State in June, 1915, which probably accounts for its inclusion in the 1915 news stream.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for finding the related photo of Bryan.  We will update the information in the description.
